column1: Smoque BBQ////The best BBQ in the city. Possibly the best BBQ outside of Texas. I had pulled pork
column5: and slaw. The pork was juicy and melted in my mouth. The sausage was smoky and spicy
column6: with a crisp casing without being dry. The sides were delicous. Nothing needed the smoky bbq sauce
column7: but I still put it on everything. Can't wait to be back to try the brisket and ribs. Everything on my plate was consumed
column8: and I collapsed into a food coma without regrets.
